--- alter_table_alter_column_set.sql
alter table foo alter column foo set options(allow_commit_timestamp = true)
--- AST
&parser.AlterTable{
  pos:  0,
  Name: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  12,
    end:  15,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &parser.AlterColumnSet{
    pos:  16,
    Name: &parser.Ident{
      pos:  29,
      end:  32,
      Name: "foo",
    },
    Options: &parser.ColumnDefOptions{
      pos:                  37,
      end:                  75,
      AllowCommitTimestamp: true,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ALTER COLUMN foo SET OPTIONS(allow_commit_timestamp = true)
